  • Constructor Details

    • OrderHistoryController

      public OrderHistoryController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the table columns and loads order history data from the database. Maps table columns to OrderRow properties and populates the table with results.

    • handleBackToCashier

      private void handleBackToCashier(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Returns the user back to the POS (cashier) view when the "Back" button is clicked. Loads POS.fxml and replaces the current scene.
      Parameters:
      event - the button click event triggering the view switch

    • load

      private void load()
      Loads the most recent 500 orders from the database and populates the TableView. Each order includes its ID, timestamp, concatenated item list, and total price. The query joins multiple tables (orders, lineItems, mealItems, and menu) to assemble order data.
